remarks: A function with a given domain is a mapping defined by its function values.  (Contributed by AV, 1-Mar-2019.)
statement:
fnmptfvd.m $e |- ( ph -> M Fn A ) $.
fnmptfvd.s $e |- ( i = a -> D = C ) $.
fnmptfvd.d $e |- ( ( ph /\ i e. A ) -> D e. U ) $.
fnmptfvd.c $e |- ( ( ph /\ a e. A ) -> C e. V ) $.
fnmptfvd $p |- ( ph -> ( M = ( a e. A |-> C ) <-> A. i e. A ( M ` i ) = D ) ) $.
$d A a i $.
$d C i $.
$d D a $.
$d M a i $.
$d U a i $.
$d V a i $.
$d a i ph $.
